item.title: Moving from Microsoft Lumia 950 to OnePlus 3
item.description: In this blog post I want to share the experience I made moving from Microsoft Lumia 950 to OnePlus 3. Prologue Let me clarify that first: I have always been a WP & Lumia-Lover. I had Windows Phones right from the start and never had another phone ever before. So for me it was clear to also jump to the newest one, the 950, and I was sure to love it.
